synopsis.text: Phantom thief Kaitou Kid has set his sights on a new prize: the Crystal Mother, Europe's largest topaz, owned by the Queen of Ingram. The jewel is hidden aboard the Royal Express luxury train, where the Queen is traveling from Tokyo to Osaka. Kaitou Kid's plan to steal the gem is complicated by the presence of Conan Edogawa, who suspects the thief's intentions and begins his own investigation. Meanwhile, Inspector Ginzou Nakamori prepares for a showdown with the elusive thief. Adding to the challenge, a criminal duo also has their eyes on the topaz and plans to eliminate the Queen. Will Kaitou Kid be able to outsmart them all and pull off the heist of the century? This thrilling story has also been adapted in episodes of "Magic Kaito: Kid the Phantom Thief" and "Magic Kaito 1412."
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
